Name: Understanding the entity and its context - Interested parties
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of determining interested parties that are relevant to its information security.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine interested parties that are relevant to its information security.

Name: Understanding the entity and its context - Requirements of interested parties
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of determination of requirements of interested parties.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine the requirements of these interested parties.

Name: Understanding the entity and its context - Sector or national context
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of determining the factors related to the sector or national context.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine factors related to its sector or national context.

Name: Understanding the entity and its context - Internal Capabilities
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of determining the internal capabilities.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine its internal capabilities.

Name: Understanding the entity and its context - Organizational structure
Risk: Unauthorized access due to lack of determining the organizational structure.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine its organizational structure.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Information security policy & objectives
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of information security policy and information security objectives.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall make sure the information security policy and the information security objectives are established and are compatible with the strategic direction of the entity.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Integration of information security requirements into processes
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of the integration of the information security requirements into the entity’s processes.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall make sure the integration of the information security requirements into the entity’s processes.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Availability of resources
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of resources needed for information security.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall make sure that the resources needed for information security are available.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Communicate importance of effectiveness
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of communication of the importance of the effectiveness of information security management.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall communicate the importance of the effectiveness of information security management.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Direct & support
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of direction and support persons to contribute to the effectiveness of information security and conforming to the requirements of  regulatory standards.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall direct and support persons to contribute to the effectiveness of information security and conforming to the requirements of regulatory standards.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Continual improvement
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of top management commitment to promote continual improvement.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall promote continual improvement.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Support other roles
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of management support to other relevant management roles related to information security.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall support other relevant management roles to demonstrate their leadership as it applies to their areas of responsibility.

Name: Leadership and management commitment - Participate in reviews
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of top management direction to and participating in reviews of information security, including risks, controls and effectiveness, on a high level.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management commitment shall give direction to and participating in reviews of information security, including risks, controls and effectiveness, on a high level.

Name: Roles and responsibilities for information security - Assign responsibilities and authorities
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of assignation of responsibility and the authority for ensuring that the information security implemented in the entity conforms to the requirements of the uae ia regulation.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management shall assign the responsibility and the authority for ensuring that the information security implemented in the entity conforms to the requirements of the uae ia regulation.

Name: Roles and responsibilities for information security - Information security performance reporting
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of assignation of the responsibility of reporting on the performance of information security to top management.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management shall assign the responsibility and the authority for reporting on the performance of information security to top management.

Name: Roles and responsibilities for information security - Appoint Information Security Manager
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of appointment of an information security manager.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management shall make sure that an information security manager is appointed to take overall responsibility for the establishment, implementation, maintenance and continual improvement of information security.

Name: Roles and responsibilities for information security - Establish Information Security Committee
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of establishment of an information security committee.
Treatment: Ensure that the top management shall make sure that an information security committee is established that oversees and governs the establishment, implementation, maintenance and continual improvement of information security in the entity, and that integrates information security in the entity.

Name: Information security policy - Appropriateness
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to inappropriate  information security policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security policy shall be appropriate to the purpose of the entity.

Name: Information security policy - Framework for objectives
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due  lack of  framework for setting information security objectives and/or include information security objectives in information security policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security policy shall provide the framework for setting information security objectives and/or include information security objectives.

Name: Information security policy - Commitment to satisfy requirements
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of a commitment to satisfy all applicable information security requirements in the information security policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security policy shall include a commitment to satisfy all applicable information security requirements.

Name: Information security policy - Commitment to continual improvement
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of a commitment to continual improvement of the information security management system in information security policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security policy shall include a commitment to continual improvement of the information security management system.

Name: Information security policy - Available as a document
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of documentation of information security policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security policy shall be documented.

Name: Information security policy - Maintenance, review, and update
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of   maintenance, review and update of information security policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security policy shall be maintained, reviewed and updated at planned intervals or if significant changes occur.

Name: Supporting policies for information security -Define, approve, and publish
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of  defining, approving, publishing and communicating set of supporting information security polices to employees and relevant external parties.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall be defined, approved, published and communicated to employees and relevant external parties.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Cover all aspects of information security
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of addressing all aspects of information security that are included in regulatory standard(s), based on the risk assessment.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall address all aspects of information security that are included in this standard, based on the risk assessment.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Sector specific requirements
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of addressing sector-specific regulations and standards in information security polices.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall address sector-specific regulations and standards.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Suitable
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of  suitability of information security polices.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall be suitable to the entity and shall have a clearly identified audience.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Reflect implementation
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of synchronisation between the implementation of information security and statements in the information security policies.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall reflect the implementation the entity has chosen and shall not include any statements the entity does not comply with.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Top management commitment
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of top management in supporting information security polices.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall include commitment of the top management.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Available as a document
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of documentation of set of supporting information security polices.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall be documented.

Name: Supporting policies for information security - Maintenance, review, and update
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack maintenance, review and update of supporting information security polices.
Treatment: Ensure that the set of supporting information security polices shall be maintained, reviewed and updated at planned intervals or if significant changes occur.

Name: Authorization process for information systems - Define and implement
Risk: Asset loss due to lack of implementation a management authorization process for new information systems.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define and implement a management authorization process for new information systems.

Name: Authorization process for information systems - Regulate
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of entity regulation of the use of personal information systems for processing business information.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall regulate the use of personal information systems for processing business information.

Name: Confidentiality agreements - Define a template
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of non disclosure agreement to legally protect confidential information and ownership of information.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define a non-disclosure agreement (nda) template to be used to legally protect confidential information and ownership of information.

Name: Confidentiality agreements - Information classification process
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of an information classification process to identify which information is subject to the terms of the nda.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall have an information classification process in place to identify which information is subject to the terms of the nda.

Name: Confidentiality agreements - Track all signed NDAs
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of a track record of all signed ndas.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall keep a track record of all signed ndas and perform a periodical review.

Name: Contact with authorities - Identify relevant authorities
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of identification of all relevant national authorities, including sector specific regulators.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify all relevant national authorities, including sector specific regulators.

Name: Contact with authorities - Identify a point of contact
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of identification of a point of contact and communicate his/her name to the identified authorities, if required or allowed.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify a point of contact in the entity and communicate his/her name to the identified authorities, if required or allowed.

Name: Contact with authorities - Establish a policy
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of establishment of a policy to determine when and how to engage relevant authorities.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall establish a policy to determine when and how to engage  relevant authorities.

Name: Contact with special interest groups - Identify interest groups
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of identification of all relevant national and international interest groups or working groups or other specialist security forums and professional associations.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify all relevant national and international interest groups or working groups or other specialist security forums and professional associations.

Name: Contact with special interest groups - Allocate resources
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of allocation of the right resources in order to properly support the group.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall allocate the right resources in order to properly support the group.

Name: Contact with special interest groups - Define what is allowed to share
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of defining what participating employees are allowed to share.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define what participating employees are allowed to share.

Name: Contact with special interest groups - Interest group sharing rules
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of permissions for sharing and circulation of information inside the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall allow sharing and circulation of information inside the entity, as permitted by interest group rules.

Name: Identification of risks related to external parties - Identify risks
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of identification of risks to its information and information systems and implement the appropriate controls before granting access to any external party.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify risks to its information and information systems and implement the appropriate controls before granting access to any external party.

Name: Identification of risks related to external parties - Access policy
Risk: Damage caused by third parties due to lack of external party access policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define an external party access policy.

Name: Identification of risks related to external parties - Adopt controls
Risk: Damage caused by third parties due to lack of identification and adoption of proper controls to limit physical and logical access to information assets and entity information systems.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify and adopt proper controls to limit physical and logical access to information assets and entity information systems.

Name: Identification of risks related to external parties - Monitor access
Risk: Damage caused by third parties due to lack of monitoring external party access to entity information and information systems.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall monitor external party access to entity information and entity information systems.

Name: Addressing security when dealing with customers - Compliance
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of compliance with the entity’s information security policy and security requirements by customer accessing entity information and information systems.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall make sure that any customer accessing entity information and information systems are compliant with the entity’s information security policy and security requirements.

Name: Addressing security when dealing with customers - Monitor access
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of monitoring any customer access and verifying compliance to agreed access control policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall monitor any customer access and verify compliance to agreed access control policy.

Name: Addressing security in third-party agreements - Requirements in contracts
Risk: Damage caused by third parties due to lack of verification that the contract or agreement with third parties addresses all aspects of the entity’s information security policy regarding accessing, processing, communicating or managing the entity’s information or information systems, or adding products or services to information systems.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall verify that any contract or agreement with third parties addresses all aspects of the entity’s information security policy regarding accessing, processing, communicating or managing the entity’s information or information systems, or adding products or services to information systems.

Name: Addressing security in third-party agreements - Controls in contracts
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of proper controls in the contract to verify compliance with the agreed security objectives.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall make sure that proper controls are introduced in the contract in order to verify compliance with the agreed security objectives.

Name: Addressing security in third-party agreements - Audit
Risk: Damage caused by third parties due to lack of audit of third parties services and infrastructures.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall perform audit of third parties services and infrastructures to verify compliance with agreed security objectives.

Name: Resources - Adequate number of resources
Risk: User/human error due to lack of sufficient amount of human and financial resources for the work to be carried out for information security.
Treatment: Ensure that the amount of human and financial resources provided shall be adequate for the work to be carried out for information security.

Name: Resources - Competency requirements
Risk: User/human error due to lack of determining the necessary competence of person(s) doing work under its control that affects its information security performance.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine the necessary competence of person(s) doing work under its control that affects its information security performance.

Name: Resources - Competency assessment
Risk: User/human error due to lack of competency of persons on the basis of appropriate education, training, or experience.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that the persons are competent on the basis of appropriate education, training, or experience.

Name: Resources - Competency improvement
Risk: User/human error due to lack of taking actions to acquire the necessary competence, and evaluate the effectiveness of the actions taken.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall take actions to acquire the necessary competence, and evaluate the effectiveness of the actions taken.

Name: Resources - Evidence of competence
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of retaining appropriate documented information as evidence of competence.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall retain appropriate documented information as evidence of competence.

Name: Internal and external communication - Communication plan
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of effective communication plan.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine:       a. on what to communicate       b. when to communicate       c. with whom to communicate       d. who shall communicate       e. the processes by which communication shall be effected.

Name: Internal and external communication - Communication with UAE government entities
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of adequate communication with the designated uae government entities.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that adequate communication can be maintained with the designated uae government entities.

Name: Internal and external communication - Available as a document
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of communication plan.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the communication plan.

Name: Documentation - Approval of documents
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of approval of documents prior to issue.
Treatment: Ensure that documents are approved prior to issue.

Name: Documentation - Review of documents
Risk: Cyber attack caused by outdated documents due to lack of review and update of documents.
Treatment: Ensure that documents are reviewed and updated as necessary.

Name: Documentation - Version control
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of identification of changes and the current revision status of documents.
Treatment: Ensure that changes and the current revision status of documents are identified.

Name: Documentation - Clear and identifiable
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of legible and readily identifiable documents.
Treatment: Ensure that documents remain legible and readily identifiable

Name: Documentation - Available
Risk: Cyber attack caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of availability of documents to those who need them.
Treatment: Ensure that documents are available to those who need them, are transferred, and stored in accordance with the procedures applicable to their classification.

Name: Documentation - Disposal
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of disposal of documents in accordance with the procedures applicable to their classification.
Treatment: Ensure that documents are disposed of in accordance with the procedures applicable to their classification.

Name: Documentation - External Origin
Risk: Damage caused by a third party due to lack of identification of documents of external origin.
Treatment: Ensure that documents of external origin are identified.

Name: Documentation - Distribution
Risk: Data leakage lack of controlled distribution of documents.
Treatment: Ensure that the distribution of documents is controlled.

Name: Documentation - Update
Risk: Cyber attack caused by obsolete documents due to lack of availability of updated date versions.
Treatment: Ensure that the unintended use of obsolete documents is prevented, and that up to date versions are available.

Name: Documentation - Retention
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of suitable identification of documents if they are retained for any purpose.
Treatment: Ensure that suitable identification is applied to documents if they are retained for any purpose.

Name: Documentation - Reference to regulation
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of alignment of document control/documents management with the regulatory requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the compliance with the “mandatory” controls in a way that allows unique reference to the requirements of regulatory requirements.

Name: Information security risk management policy - TRA's Issuances
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of using relevant tra’s issuances in information security risk management policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall take into account relevant tra’s issuances in regard to risk management.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Documented and approved
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of approval of information security risk management policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall be documented and formally approved.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Address scope of services and functions
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of addressing the purpose and scope of critical services and their supporting functions in information security risk management policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy addresses the purpose and scope of critical services and their supporting functions.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Information asset categorization
Risk: Critical asset loss due to lack of categorization of information asset based on its criticality.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall categorize information asset based on its criticality.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Roles and responsibilities
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of documenting roles and responsibilities of the risk assessment team.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall address roles and responsibilities of the risk assessment team involved.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Risk acceptance criteria
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of including information security basic criteria, including the risk acceptance criteria, impact criteria, and risk evaluation criteria in the information security risk management policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall establish and maintain information security basic criteria, including the risk acceptance criteria, impact criteria, and risk evaluation criteria.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Risk treatment strategy
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of risk treatment strategy in the information security risk management policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall contain a risk treatment strategy.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Risk monitoring and review strategy
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of monitoring and review strategy in information security risk management policy .
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall contain a risk monitoring and review strategy.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Criteria for performing, review and update
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of determining the criteria for performing, reviewing and updating information security risk assessments.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall determine the criteria for performing, reviewing and updating information security risk assessments.

Name: Information security risk management policy - Consistent, valid and comparable
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of repeated information security risk assessments producing consistent, valid and comparable results.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security risk management policy shall produce consistent, valid and comparable results for repeated information security risk assessments.

Name: Information security risk identification - Risks associated with CIA
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of identification of risks associated with the loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability for its information.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall apply the information security risk assessment process to identify risks associated with the loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability for its information by:  • define the scope of the risk assessment exercise  • identify critical business functions  • identify critical information systems supporting business critical functions within the scope and boundary of the risk assessment  • identifying vulnerabilities related to the information and information systems.   • identify existing information security controls  • identifying threats and threat sources

Name: Information security risk identification - Identify risk owners
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of identification of the risk owners.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify the risk owners.

Name: Information security risk identification - Document risk identification results
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of documentation of the results of the risk identification.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the results of the risk identification.

Name: Information security risk analysis - Assess potential consequences
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of assessment of the potential consequences that would result if the identified risks were to materialize by assessing the consequences of losses of confidentiality, integrity or availability.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall assess the potential consequences that would result if the identified risks were to materialize by assessing the consequences of losses of confidentiality, integrity or availability.

Name: Information security risk analysis - Assess likelihood
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of assessment of the realistic likelihood of the occurrence of the identified risks based on the existing controls, identified vulnerabilities and threats.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall assess the realistic likelihood of the occurrence of the identified risks based on the existing controls, identified vulnerabilities and threats.

Name: Information security risk analysis - Determine the level of risks
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of determining the levels of risk.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine the levels of risk.

Name: Information security risk analysis - Document risk analysis results
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of documentation of the results of the risk analysis.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the results of the risk analysis.

Name: Information security risk evaluation - Compare risks with criteria
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of comparison of the analyzed risks with the risk criteria established in the information security risk management policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall compare the analyzed risks with the risk criteria established in the information security risk management policy.

Name: Information security risk evaluation - Priorities for treatment
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of prioritisation for treatment of the identified risks.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall establish priorities for treatment of the identified risks.

Name: Information security risk evaluation - Document results
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documentation of the results of the risk evaluation and sharing with national and sector authorities.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the results of the risk evaluation and share with national and sector authorities, as required.

Name: Information security risk treatment options - Consider treatment options
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of considering the the uae ia suggested risk treatment options.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall consider the following risk treatment options and select one or more of them for each of the risks that have been assessed:  • risk reduction – reducing the risk by applying security controls  • risk retention – accepting the risk based on the entity’s risk  accepting criteria established on the information management  risk policy   • risk avoidance – avoiding the activity or condition causing the risk  • risk transfer – transferring the risk to another party

Name: Information security risk treatment options - Success of chosen option
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of assessment of the risk treatment chosen to ensure that the selection of risk treatment options is successful.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall assess the risk treatment chosen to ensure that the selection of risk treatment options is successful by:  • deciding whether residual risk levels are tolerable  • if not tolerable, generating a new risk treatment  • assessing the effectiveness of that treatment

Name: Identification of controls - Control consideration
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of considering the controls included in the regulatory standards as a starting point for the control identification.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall consider the controls included in these standards as a starting point for the control identification.

Name: Identification of controls - Produce SOA
Risk: Breach of legislation due to overlooking controls while producing the statement of applicability.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that no controls are overlooked by producing the statement of applicability.

Name: Identification of controls - Identify additional controls
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of identification of controls in addition to the controls suggested in regulatory standard(s) that are specific to the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify controls in addition to the controls suggested in this standard that are specific to the entity.

Name: Identification of controls - Take into account risk acceptance criteria
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of considering the criteria for accepting risks as well as legal, regulatory and contractual requirements when making the control selection.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall take account of the criteria for accepting risks as well as legal, regulatory and contractual requirements when making the control selection.

Name: Risk treatment plan - Requirements to be addressed in the plan
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of an effective risk treatment plan.
Treatment: Ensure that the risk treatment plan shall identify:  a. appropriate management actions  b. resources required  c. responsibilities and priorities for managing information security risks  d. target dates for implementation of the identified controls

Name: Risk treatment plan - Plan to be documented
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of documentation of effective risk treatment plan.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the risk treatment plan.

Name: Statement of applicability - List of controls
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documentation of a statement of applicability that contains the controls that have been identified as necessary.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall produce and document a statement of applicability  that contains the controls that have been identified as necessary.

Name: Statement of applicability - Reasons for identifying these controls
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documentation of a statement of applicability that contains reasons for identification of these controls.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall produce and document a statement of applicability  that contains reasons for identification of these controls.

Name: Statement of applicability - Implementation status
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documentation of a statement of applicability that contains the current status of implementation.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall produce and document a statement of applicability  that contains their current status of implementation.

Name: Statement of applicability - Justification for exclusion
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documentation of a statement of applicability that contains justification for exclusion of any of the “risk-based applicable” controls contained in regulatory standard(s).
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall produce and document a statement of applicability  that contains justification for exclusion of any of the “risk-based applicable” controls contained in these standards.

Name: Information security objectives - SMART Objectives
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of documenting all requirements of information security objectives.
Treatment: Ensure that the information security objectives shall:       a. be consistent with the information security policy       b. be measurable (if practicable)       c. take into account applicable information security requirements, and risk assessment and treatment results       d. be communicated within the entity       e. be updated as appropriate       f. be documented.

Name: Information security risk assessment review and update - Changes to be accounted
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of taking account of changes to the legal or regulatory environment, changed contractual obligations, and changes in social climate in risk monitoring and review processes.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity’s monitoring and review processes shall encompass all aspects of the risk management process and shall take account of changes in:       a. the entity itself       b. technology used       c. business objectives and processes       d. risk criteria and the risk assessment process       e. assets and consequences of losses of confidentiality, integrity  or availability       f. identified threats;       g. identified vulnerabilities       h. effectiveness of the implemented controls       i. external events, such as changes to the legal or regulatory environment, changed contractual obligations, and changes in social climate.

Name: Information security risk assessment review and update - Incidents that trigger risk assessment
Risk: Cyber attack caused by prolonged crisis situation due to lack of monitoring security incidents that might trigger the risk assessment process.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall monitor security incidents that might trigger the risk assessment process.

Name: Information security risk assessment review and update - Responsibilities for monitoring and review
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of defining responsibilities for monitoring and reviewing risks.
Treatment: Ensure that the responsibilities for monitoring and review shall be clearly defined and documented.

Name: Risk communication and consultation - Risk communication plan
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of establishment of a risk communication plan for communicating risk information with key stakeholders including decision-makers within the entity during all stages of the risk management process.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall establish a risk communication plan for communicating risk information with key stakeholders including decision-makers within the entity during all stages of the risk management process.

Name: Risk communication and consultation - Consider UAE IA issuances
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of taking into account all regulatory requirements with regard to risk management.
Treatment: Take all regulatory requirements into account when conducting risk management.

Name: Awareness and training policy - Appropriateness
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of appropriate awareness and training policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the awareness and training policy shall be appropriate to the purpose of the entity.

Name: Awareness and training policy - Framework for objectives
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of framework for setting awareness and training objectives.
Treatment: Ensure that the awareness and training policy shall provide the framework for setting awareness and training objectives.

Name: Awareness and training policy - Facilitate implementation of controls
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of the implementation of the associated controls.
Treatment: Ensure that the awareness and training policy shall facilitate the implementation of the associated controls.

Name: Awareness and training policy - Roles and responsibilities
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of roles and responsibilities of providers and recipients of awareness and training activities.
Treatment: Ensure that the awareness and training policy shall outline the roles and responsibilities of providers and recipients of awareness and training activities.

Name: Awareness and training program - Effectiveness contribution
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of intimating persons doing work under the entity of their contribution to the effectiveness of information security and the implications of not conforming to the information security requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the awareness and training program shall inform persons doing work under the entity of their contribution to the effectiveness of information security and the implications of not conforming to the information security requirements.

Name: Awareness and training program - Necessary competencies
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of determining the necessary competencies for personnel performing work effecting information security.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine the necessary competencies for personnel performing work effecting information security.

Name: Awareness and training program - Training provision
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of providing training or taking other actions (e.g. employing competent personnel) to satisfy the training needs.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall provide training or taking other actions (e.g. employing competent personnel) to satisfy these needs.

Name: Awareness and training program - Effectiveness evaluation
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of evaluation of the effectiveness of the actions taken.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall evaluate the effectiveness of the actions taken.

Name: Awareness and training program - Maintain records
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of maintaining records of education, training, skills, experience and qualifications.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall maintain records of education, training, skills, experience and qualifications.

Name: Training needs - Identify needed skills
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of identification of the information security skills needed within the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify the information security skills needed within the entity.

Name: Training needs - Assess current skills
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of assessing the current information skills in place within the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall assess the current information skills in place within the entity.

Name: Training needs - Identify gaps
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of identification of gaps between required and in place information security skills.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify gaps between required and in place information security skills.

Name: Implementation plan - Training solutions
Risk: Cyber attack due to lack of identification of solutions for each information security training need that has been identified.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify solutions for each information security training need that has been identified.

Name: Implementation plan - Timeline for delivery
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of a timeline for delivering the information security training solutions.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop a timeline for delivering the information security training solutions.

Name: Implementation plan - Resources
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of sufficient resources to execute information security training are allocated to the program.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure resources needed to execute information security training are allocated to the program.

Name: Training execution - Implementation plan
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of compliance to the training implementation plan.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that information security training proceeds according to the implementation plan.

Name: Training execution - Training solutions
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of identification of alternative information security training solutions if problems with the implementation plan arise.
Treatment: The entity shall identify alternative information security training solutions if problems with the implementation plan arise.

Name: Training execution - Training needs
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of including all of the information security training needs identified in the updated implementation plan.
Treatment: Ensure that the updated implementation plan satisfies all of the information security training needs identified.

Name: Training results - Knowledge and skills
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of measuring the level of information security knowledge and skills in the entity before and after the training plan is implemented.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall measure the level of information security knowledge and skills in the entity before and after the training plan is implemented.

Name: Training results - Training solutions
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of meeting the expected outcomes against the knowledge requirements of the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that the information security training solutions implemented are meeting the expected outcomes against the knowledge requirements of the entity.

Name: Training results - Corrective action
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of corrective action to improve or replace training solutions that are not reaching the expected outcome.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall take corrective action to improve or replace training solutions that are not reaching the expected outcome.

Name: Records documentation - Training record
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of training records.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that each target for information security training has a documented training record.

Name: Records documentation - Capture activities
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of capturing all training activities in the individual training records containing personnel education, training, skills, experience and qualifications.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that all training activities are captured in the individual training records containing personnel education, training, skills, experience and qualifications.

Name: Records documentation - Review records
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of reviewing training records periodically to ensure all stakeholders have completed the necessary training.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall review training records periodically to make sure all stakeholders have completed the necessary training.

Name: Awareness campaign - Define scope
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of defining the scope of the awareness campaign in terms of targets and content based on security risks relevant to users’ activities.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define the scope of the awareness campaign in terms of targets and content based on security risks relevant to users’ activities.

Name: Awareness campaign - Provide timeline
Risk: Unintentional data leakage due to lack of providing a timeline for deploying specific awareness campaigns to meet the program objectives.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall provide a timeline for deploying specific awareness campaigns to meet the program objectives.

Name: Awareness campaign - Comply with timeline
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of information security campaigns proceeding according to the defined program timeline.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that information security campaigns proceed according to the defined program timeline.

Name: Awareness campaign - Alternative campaigns
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of identifying alternative information security awareness campaigns if problems with the program timeline arise.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify alternative information security awareness campaigns if problems with the program timeline arise.

Name: Awareness campaign - Updated campaign
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of satisfying all of the program objectives and needs identified.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure the updated information security awareness campaign satisfies all of the program objectives and needs identified.

Name: Human resources security policy - Establish policy
Risk: Human error due to lack of outlining roles and responsibilities of different stakeholders, and procedures to facilitate the implementation of the human resource security controls.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall establish and maintain a human resources security policy that outlines roles and responsibilities of different stakeholders, and procedures to facilitate the implementation of the associated controls.

Name: Human resources security policy - Implement controls
Risk: Human error due to lack of identification and implementation of associated controls.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify and implement associated controls.

Name: Screening - Define background verification
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of defining a background verification check process in accordance with relevant laws, regulations and ethics, and proportional to the business requirements, the classification of the information to be accessed, and the perceived risks.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define a background verification check process in accordance with relevant laws, regulations and ethics, and proportional to the business requirements, the classification of the information to be accessed, and the perceived risks.

Name: Screening - Perform background verification
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of performing background verification checks for all candidates for employment, contractors and third party personnel.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall perform background verification checks for all candidates for employment, contractors and third party personnel.

Name: Terms and conditions of employment - Terms and conditions
Risk: Intentional data leakage due to lack of defining standard information security terms and conditions for employees, third parties and contractors.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define standard information security terms and conditions for employees, third parties and contractors.

Name: Terms and conditions of employment - Contract terms
Risk: Intentional data leakage due to lack of including information security terms and conditions in any contract.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall include information security terms and conditions in any contract.

Name: Terms and conditions of employment - Understand terms
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of fully understanding the relevant terms and conditions by the employees, contractors, and third parties .
Treatment: Ensure that the employees, contractors, and third parties fully understand their relevant terms and conditions.

Name: Terms and conditions of employment - Review contract
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of reviewing and  amending any existing contract with employees, contractors and third parties.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall review and eventually amend any existing contract with employees, contractors and third parties.

Name: Management responsibilities - Compliance with policies
Risk: Intentional data leakage due to lack of compliance requirements in the human resources security policy for employees, contractors and third party users.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall include in human resources security policy that employees, contractors and third party users have to comply with entity security policies and procedures.

Name: Management responsibilities - Inform personnel
Risk: Intentional data leakage due to lack of informing all employees, contractors and third parties of the security policies they are required to be compliant with.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall inform all employees, contractors and third parties of the security policies they are required to be compliant with.

Name: Management responsibilities - Read and accept
Risk: Intentional data leakage due to lack of reading and accepting relevant security policy/guidelines by users.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall present, on first access, relevant security policy/guidelines for users to read and accept.

Name: Disciplinary Process - Define process
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of a formal disciplinary process.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define a formal disciplinary process.

Name: Disciplinary Process - Awareness
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of sufficient awareness about this disciplinary process within the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure sufficient awareness about this disciplinary process within the entity.

Name: Disciplinary Process - Enforce
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of enforcing the disciplinary process.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall enforce the disciplinary process.

Name: Disciplinary Process - Records of breaches
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of keeping records of the committed security breaches.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall keep records of the committed security breaches.

Name: Termination responsibilities - Define policy
Risk: Unauthorized access and/changes due to lack of an employee termination policy that emphasizes the communication of termination responsibilities in relation to entities information security (including confidentiality and property rights).
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define an employee termination policy that emphasizes the communication of termination responsibilities in relation to entities information security (including confidentiality and property rights).

Name: Termination responsibilities - Assign responsibility
Risk: Unauthorized access and/changes due to lack of assigning the responsibility for performing termination or change of employment.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall assign responsibility for performing termination or change of employment.

Name: Return of assets - Return of assets
Risk: Misuse of information assets due to lack of including in employee termination policy that all employees, contractors and third parties should return of all assets upon termination of employment, contract or agreement.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall include in employee termination policy that all employees, contractors and third parties should return of all assets upon termination of employment, contract or agreement.

Name: Removable of access rights - Verify compliance
Risk: Unauthorized access and/changes due to lack of verifying that the termination policy and procedure is followed for any termination or change of employment, contract or agreement.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall verify that the termination policy and procedure is followed for any termination or change of employment, contract or agreement with particular attention to revocation of credentials/access to any information facility.

Name: Compliance policy - Appropriate policy
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of appropriate compliance policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the compliance policy shall be appropriate to the purpose of the entity.

Name: Compliance policy - Roles and responsibilities
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of outlining the roles and responsibilities for establishing compliance requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the compliance policy shall outline the roles and responsibilities for establishing compliance requirements.

Name: Compliance policy - Establish requirements
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of compliance policy  outlining the approach for establishing compliance requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the compliance policy shall outline the approach for establishing compliance requirements.

Name: Compliance policy
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of outlining the approach the entity will follow to ensure compliance with the identified requirements at the entity, sector, and national levels.
Treatment: Ensure that the compliance policy shall outline the approach the entity will follow to ensure compliance with the identified requirements at the entity, sector, and national levels.

Name: Identification of applicable legislation - Develop process
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of developing a process to identify on an ongoing basis all compliance requirements applicable to the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop a process to identify on an ongoing basis all compliance requirements applicable to the entity.

Name: Identification of applicable legislation - Determine system requirements
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of determining specific system requirements resulting from the identified compliance requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine specific system requirements resulting from the identified compliance requirements.

Name: Identification of applicable legislation - Meet requirements
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of defining specific controls to ensure all compliance requirements are met.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define specific controls to ensure all compliance requirements are met.

Name: Identification of applicable legislation - Periodic review
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of periodically reviewing compliance requirements and associated controls for completeness.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall periodically review compliance requirements and associated controls for completeness.

Name: Identification of applicable legislation - Legislation requirements
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documenting all legislation requirements with individual responsibilities to meet these requirements as well as controls in-place.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document all legislation requirements with individual responsibilities to meet these requirements as well as controls in-place.

Name: Intellectual property rights (IPR) - Develop policy
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of developing and maintaining an intellectual property rights compliance policy.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop and maintain an intellectual property rights compliance policy.

Name: Intellectual property rights (IPR) - Develop process
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of developing a process to identify all applicable requirements the entity must meet in terms of protecting intellectual property rights.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop a process to identify all applicable requirements the entity must meet in terms of protecting intellectual property rights.

Name: Intellectual property rights (IPR) - Specific requirements
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of determining specific system requirements resulting from the  identified requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall  determine specific system requirements resulting from the identified requirements.

Name: Intellectual property rights (IPR) - Meet requirements
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of defining specific controls to ensure all intellectual property right protection requirements are met.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define specific controls to ensure all intellectual property right protection requirements are met.

Name: Intellectual property rights (IPR) - Periodic review
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of periodically reviewing requirements and associated controls for completeness.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall periodically review requirements and associated controls related to intellectual property rights (ipr) for completeness.

Name: Protection of organizational records - Define process
Risk: Unauthorized access and/changes due to lack of a process for identifying records with specific compliance requirements regarding loss, destruction, falsification, or other applicable characteristics.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define a process for identifying records with specific compliance requirements regarding loss, destruction, falsification, or other applicable characteristics.

Name: Protection of organizational records - Determine requirements
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of specific system requirements resulting from the identified requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine specific system requirements related to protection of organizational records resulting from the identified requirements.

Name: Protection of organizational records - Define controls
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of defining specific controls to ensure all record protection requirements are met.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define specific controls to ensure all record protection requirements are met.

Name: Protection of organizational records - Periodic review
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of periodically review requirements and associated controls for completeness of records.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall periodically review requirements and associated controls related to protection of organizational records for completeness.

Name: Data protection and privacy of personal information - Define process
Risk: Breach of personally identifiable information (pii) due to lack of defining a process for identifying data with specific compliance requirements regarding protection and privacy.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define a process for identifying data with specific compliance requirements regarding protection and privacy.

Name: Data protection and privacy of personal information  - Determine requirements
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of determining specific system requirements resulting from the identified requirements for privacy.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine specific system requirements resulting from the identified requirements related to data protection and privacy of personal information.

Name: Data protection and privacy of personal information - Define controls
Risk: Breach of personally identifiable information (pii) due to lack of defining specific controls to ensure all data protection and privacy requirements are met.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define specific controls to ensure all data protection and privacy requirements are met.

Name: Data protection and privacy of personal information  - Periodic review
Risk: Breach of personally identifiable information (pii) due to lack of periodically review requirements and associated controls for completeness.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall periodically review requirements and associated controls related to data protection and privacy of personal information for completeness.

Name: Prevention of misuse of information systems - Communication
Risk: Unauthorized access and/changes due to lack of communicating to all stakeholders what is considered to be authorized use of information systems.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall clearly communicate to all stakeholders what is considered to be authorized use of information systems.

Name: Prevention of misuse of information systems - Develop capability
Risk: Misuse of information assets due to lack of capability to monitor information systems for unauthorized use.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop the capability to monitor information systems for unauthorized use.

Name: Prevention of misuse of information systems - Corrective action
Risk: Misuse of information assets due to lack of taking corrective action to stop unauthorized use of information systems when detected.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall take corrective action to stop unauthorized use of information systems when detected.

Name: Regulation of cryptographic controls - Define process
Risk: Man in the middle attack due to lack of a process for identifying applicable compliance requirements regarding use of cryptographic controls within the entity.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define a process for identifying applicable compliance requirements regarding use of cryptographic controls within the entity.

Name: Regulation of cryptographic controls - Determine requirements
Risk: Man in the middle attack due to lack of determining specific cryptographic system requirements resulting from the identified requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine specific system requirements resulting from the identified requirements.

Name: Regulation of cryptographic controls - Define controls
Risk: Man in the middle attack due to lack of defining specific controls to ensure all cryptographic control requirements are met.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define specific controls to ensure all cryptographic control requirements are met.

Name: Regulation of cryptographic controls - Periodic review
Risk: Man in the middle attack due to lack of periodically reviewing cryptographic requirements and associated controls for completeness.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall periodically review requirements and associated controls for completeness.

Name: Liability to the information sharing community - Liability issues
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of identifying any liability issues and remediation requirements regarding unauthorized disclosure of information in all information sharing communities in which the entity participates.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify any liability issues and remediation requirements regarding unauthorized disclosure of information in all information sharing communities in which the entity participates.

Name: Liability to the information sharing community - Remediation procedures
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of defining specific remediation procedures for each relevant information sharing community.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define specific remediation procedures for each relevant information sharing community.

Name: Liability to the information sharing community - Communication
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of communicating to the relevant information sharing community any issues identified regarding remediation procedures.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall communicate to the relevant information sharing community any issues identified regarding remediation procedures.

Name: Compliance with security policies and standards - Identify procedures
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of identifying all security procedures that fall within the area of managerial responsibility.
Treatment: Ensure that the managers shall identify all security procedures that fall within their area of responsibility.

Name: Compliance with security policies and standards - Develop capability
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of developing the capability to monitor the execution of identified security procedures.
Treatment: Ensure that the managers shall develop the capability to monitor the execution of identified  security procedures.

Name: Compliance with security policies and standards - Corrective action
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of taking corrective action when issues regarding the execution of security procedures are identified.
Treatment: Ensure that the managers shall take corrective action when issues regarding the execution of security procedures are identified.

Name: Technical compliance checking - Define process
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of defining and executing a process for routinely checking for technical compliance with security standards.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define and execute a process for routinely checking for technical compliance with security standards.

Name: Technical compliance checking - Results of compliance checking
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of ensuring that the results of compliance checking is performed by, and the results are reviewed by, authorized personnel with adequate technical capabilities.
Treatment: Ensure that the results of compliance checking is performed by, and the results are reviewed by, authorized personnel with adequate technical capabilities.

Name: Technical compliance checking - Report issues
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of reporting any issues detected during technical compliance checking to the appropriate authority for remediation.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall report any issues detected during technical compliance checking to the appropriate authority for remediation.

Name: Information systems audit controls - Assign responsibilities
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of assigning responsibilities for internal audits of information system controls to an appropriate authority.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall assign responsibilities for internal audits of information system controls to an appropriate authority.

Name: Information systems audit controls - Define audit requirements
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of defining audit requirements for information system controls.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define audit requirements for information system controls.

Name: Information systems audit controls - Audit plan
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of outlining an audit plan to meet audit requirements for information system controls.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall outline an audit plan to meet audit requirements for information system controls.

Name: Information systems audit controls
Risk: Disruption of critical services due to lack of highlighting measures taken to ensure audit activities minimize the risk of disruptions to business processes.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall highlight measures taken to ensure audit activities minimize the risk of disruptions to business processes.

Name: Protection of information systems audit tools - Identify audit tools
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of identifying all information systems audit tools.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify all information systems audit tools.

Name: Protection of information systems audit tools - Identify types and classification levels
Risk: Unintentional misuse of information asset due to lack of identifying the types and classification levels of information stored in information systems audit tools.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify the types and classification levels of information stored in information systems audit tools.

Name: Protection of information systems audit tools - Minimum requirements
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of defining minimum security requirements for information systems audit tools commensurate to the classification levels of the information held.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define minimum security requirements for information systems audit tools commensurate to the classification levels of the information held.

Name: Audit of community functions - Audit rights
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of identifying the audit rights of any information sharing communities to which it is connected.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall identify the audit rights of any information sharing communities to which it is connected.

Name: Audit of community functions - Provisions for external members
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of ensuring that provisions for external members are accounted for in the entity’s information systems audit plan and tools.
Treatment: Ensure that the provisions for external members are accounted for in the entity’s information systems audit plan and tools.

Name: Audit of community functions - Provisions for entity
Risk: Data leakage due to lack of ensuring that provisions for the entity to exercise its audit rights are accounted for in the entity’s information systems audit plan and tools.
Treatment: Ensure that the provisions for the entity to exercise its audit rights are accounted for in the entity’s information systems audit plan  and tools.

Name: Performance evaluation policy - Overall framework
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of developing and implementing a performance evaluation policy that determines the overall framework for performance evaluation.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop and implement a performance evaluation policy that determines the overall framework for performance evaluation.

Name: Performance evaluation policy - Methods of reporting
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of developing and implementing a performance evaluation policy that determines the methods of reporting the performance evaluation results to management.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop and implement a performance evaluation policy that determines the methods of reporting the performance evaluation results to management.

Name: Performance evaluation policy - Integration with measurements
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of developing and implementing a performance evaluation policy that determines how to integrate the detailed performance measurements for controls with higher level performance measurements for information security objectives, risk management, etc.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop and implement a performance evaluation policy that determines how to integrate the detailed performance measurements for controls with higher level performance measurements for information security objectives, risk management, etc.

Name: Performance evaluation policy - Integration with incidents
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of developing and implementing a performance evaluation policy that determines how to integrate incident reports in the overall picture of performance monitoring.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall develop and implement a performance evaluation policy that determines how to integrate incident reports in the overall picture of performance monitoring.

Name: Monitoring, measurement, analysis, and evaluation - Scope
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of an effective performance evaluation management process implementation as per standard requirements.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall determine:       a. what needs to be monitored and measured, including information security processes and controls       b. the methods for monitoring, measurement, analysis and evaluation, as applicable, to ensure valid results       c. when the monitoring and measuring shall be performed       d. who shall monitor and measure       e. when the results from monitoring and measurement shall be  analyzed and evaluated       f. who shall analyze and evaluate these results.

Name: Monitoring, measurement, analysis, and evaluation - Methods and results
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documenting the monitoring and measurement methods and results.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the monitoring and measurement methods and results.

Name: Internal audits - Audit criteria, scope and plan
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of defining the audit criteria, scope and audit plan for each audit.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall define the audit criteria, scope and audit plan for each audit.

Name: Internal audits - Auditors
Risk: Human/user error due to lack of  selecting auditors and conducting audits to ensure objectivity and the impartiality of the audit process.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall select auditors and conduct audits to ensure objectivity and the impartiality of the audit process.

Name: Internal audits - Audit results
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of ensuring that the results of the audits are reported to relevant management.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall ensure that the results of the audits are reported to relevant management.

Name: Internal audits - Audit program
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of documenting the audit program and the audit results.
Treatment: Ensure that the entity shall document the audit program and the audit results.

Name: Internal audits - Effective implementation
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of ensuring that the internal audit is effectively implemented and maintained.
Treatment: Ensure that internal audit is effectively implemented and maintained.

Name: Internal audits - Management
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of planning, establishing, implementing and maintaining internal audits, including the frequency, methods, responsibilities, planning requirements, and reporting of the internal audits.
Treatment: Ensure that internal audits shall be planned, established, implemented and maintained, including the frequency, methods, responsibilities, planning requirements, and reporting of the internal audits.

Name: Internal audits - Results
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of taking into account the importance of the processes concerned and the results of previous audits.
Treatment: Ensure that the internal audits shall take account of the importance of the processes concerned and the results of previous audits

Name: Internal audits - Conformance
Risk: Breach of legislation due to lack of checking conformance with requirements of applicable information security regulations in internal audits.
Treatment: Ensure that the internal audits shall ensure that entity’s information security conforms to:       a. the entity’s own requirements for information security       b. the requirements of this standard       c. any applicable requirements from the entity’s sector, national or regulatory environment.

Name: Corrective action - Evaluation
Risk: Data leakage caused by ineffective information security management system due to lack of properly reviewing the nonconformity.
